project.description: CI/CD Pipeline for TODO App Demo

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e
echo "=== TODO App CI/CD Pipeline ===" echo "Build Number: ${BUILD_NUMBER}" echo "Workspace: ${WORKSPACE}"
# Navigate to app directory cd app
# Install dependencies echo "Installing dependencies..." npm install
# Run linting echo "Running linting..." npm run lint
# Run tests echo "Running tests..." npm test
# Build application echo "Building application..." npm run build
# Package application echo "Packaging application..." mkdir -p ../dist cp -r * ../dist/ cd .. tar -czf todo-app-demo-${BUILD_NUMBER}.tar.gz dist/
echo "=== Build completed successfully ===" echo "Package: todo-app-demo-${BUILD_NUMBER}.tar.gz"
